review: I'm so grateful and thankful to fate that Dr Uddhavraj was my doctor. His empathetic nature is what makes him a great doctor. His confidence filled with knowledge and kindness is appreciative. More power to him.  I would highly recommend him. God bless you Dr. Uddhavraj.
Dr UD was perfect selection after meeting many doctors for my radical hysterectomy. Friendly, Positive & explained every query in detail.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I felt comfortable while talking with doctor about treatment and after care. 
Over all it was very nice experience pre and post operation
